analysis.Summary: Vue single‐file component that renders a right‐pointing chevron icon as an inline SVG.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable navigation icon (chevron right) with configurable fill color for the UI.

Components.name: default export (IconChevronRight)
Components.role: Renders the SVG chevron arrow and accepts a `fill` prop to customize its color.

Dependencies: CSS variable `--black` (used in default fill value)
analysis.Usage: Import the component into other Vue files and use it in templates, e.g.: `<IconChevronRight fill="#333" />`
Notes: No `<style>` block is present; styling is controlled via the `fill` prop and inherited CSS variables.
Default `fill` prop value `rgb(var(--black)` is missing a closing parenthesis—may be a typo.
SVG viewport is set to 80×80, but path scales down to the chevron shape.
